title: "Elixer of skill" In Rakan's Inventory
body:
What I saw in short: 
They ffed short after 20 minutes, I didn't really pay attention to Rakan's items but in the post game screen ( if that's how you call it ) 
I saw Rakan have the "Elixer of skill", I don't know what is does or what it is but I don't recall ever seeing that item.

_Screenshot:_ [img]http://i.imgur.com/VgQ5lgj.png?2[/img]

I also don't know if you can sell it or not, I just know it takes up space in your inventory


I know a few people that need an elixer of skill tho ;)

replies.body: its on the new Spellthiefs Edge
No its the new ancient coin.  It gives you a lvl up point without actually lvling up after you complete its quest.

I played support some times after the Spellthiefs Edge rework and I can assure you, you don't get that item anywere in the game

Note that he started Coin and not Spellthiefs
its the ancient coin quest not frost fang ignore them
yea im retarded the point is that its from a Support item Quest lol
IT'S FROM COIN! {{item:3303}} gives a movement speed burst. How do people even get these wrong when you could just read the fucking item.
It gives you a free ability level, it is from completing frostfang.
its coin how do you get this wrong
Because my brain is currently operating on a fuel mix of memes and 5 hours of sleep after spending 5 hours troubleshooting drivers for an ubuntu installer.

So it seems I missed something, that happens
Sowwy
